data_table.description: Visit 5. Subject ID, photo, diabetic retinopathy, macular edema, arm, visit date, focal narrowing quadrants, focal narrowing superior, focal narrowing inferior, calculated variable, arterio-venous nicking superior, vein occlusion, artery or central artery occlusion, hollenhorst plaque, peripapillary atrophy, geographic atrophy, macular hole, large cup to disc ratio, left eye, pathology, asteroid hyalosis, choroidal nevus, wrinkling retinopathy, ocular histoplamosis, and retinal detachment of participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID

variable.name: RETF13
variable.description: Left eye

variable.description: ARIC exam phase, Visit_number

variable.description: Photos present, Photos
